categories.name: Portfolio
categories.description: Created this website to showcase my skills as a developer. I set a challenge to accomplish everything with no frameworks - the only resources besides HTML, CSS, and Javascript are Sass and Matter.js. Used Figma for UI design.

categories.name: 4Chess
categories.description: Developing a mobile app for Android and iOS using Flutter and Dart to allow people to play timed four player chess with a real board.

categories.name: PgnAnalyzer
categories.description: Utilizing C# command line tools to create a customizable framework that analyzes millions of chess games to discover how players play at different skill levels, such as how they start games and when they make mistakes.

categories.name: Pulse+
categories.description: Developed a mobile app for Android and iOS using React Native and Typescript that enables musicians to practice tuning and rhythm, and to create custom presets for specific songs.

categories.name: Fast->Task
categories.description: Created a desktop application with the JavaFX/FXML library that allowed the user to create a to-do list, track the progress of tasks and search for tasks by the due date.
